data.title: Full-time Research Assistant in Academia Sinica, Taipei, Taiwan   Feb. 2020 – Jun. 2020
data.brief: I created a collaborative system for both Knowledge Graph Question Generation and Question Answering. Results show improvement on WebQuestionsSP (13.0% ROUGEL score for KBQG and 1.5% accuracy for KBQA) and an unpublished dataset (27.4% ROUGE-L score for KBQG and 5.7% accuracy for KBQA) in both KBQA and KBQG tasks

data.title: AI Summer Intern in Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI), Hsinchu, Taiwan   Jul. 2017 – Aug. 2017
data.brief: I created a system search for restaurant nicknames which became a valuable service for other companies
